title: Cape Cod National Seashore: History & Culture
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture             History & Culture          Residency Program, Dune Shacks of the Peaked Hill Bars Historic District Cape Cod is only some 18,000 years old in geologic time, but its history includes a vast collection of people, places and events, most from a time long faded into memory. From the beginning of its creation to the foundation of its National Seashore, Cape Cod is one of the forbearers of our national heritage. Modern Architecture and Cape Cod National Seashore The Archeology of Outer Cape Cod Maritime History Guglielmo Marconi and the Radio French Transatlantic Cable Pilgrims
